akn:content.akn:p: § 12856. Report The Board of Directors shall submit to the Congress, not later than the expiration of the 90-day period beginning on the date of the termination of the Trust under section 12859 of this title, a report containing a description of the activities of the Trust and an analysis of the effectiveness of the Trust in assisting first-time homebuyers. (Pub. L. 101–625, title III, § 307, Nov. 28, 1990, 104 Stat. 4133.)
